links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Anthony Hyde''' is an English actor. Among his film work is ''Sharpe's Rifles'', which stars [[Sean Bean]]. Hyde voiced the part of [[Éomer]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings 1981 radio series]] broadcast on the [[BBC|BBC 4]].
